member.name: T:UnityEditor.GenericMenu
member.summary: GenericMenu lets you create custom context menus and dropdown menus.

summary.para: Allow the menu to have multiple items with the same name.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.AddDisabledItem(UnityEngine.GUIContent)

summary.para: Add a disabled item to the menu.

member.param: The GUIContent to display as a disabled menu item.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.AddDisabledItem(UnityEngine.GUIContent,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Add a disabled item to the menu.

member.param: The GUIContent to display as a disabled menu item.
Specifies whether to show that the item is currently activated (i.e. a tick next to the item in the menu).

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.AddItem(UnityEngine.GUIContent,System.Boolean,UnityEditor.GenericMenu/MenuFunction)

summary.para: Add an item to the menu.

member.param: The GUIContent to add as a menu item.
Specifies whether to show the item is currently activated (i.e. a tick next to the item in the menu).
The function to call when the menu item is selected.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.AddItem(UnityEngine.GUIContent,System.Boolean,UnityEditor.GenericMenu/MenuFunction2,System.Object)

summary.para: Add an item to the menu.

member.param: The GUIContent to add as a menu item.
Specifies whether to show the item is currently activated (i.e. a tick next to the item in the menu).
The function to call when the menu item is selected.
The data to pass to the function called when the item is selected.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.AddSeparator(System.String)

summary.para: Add a seperator item to the menu.

member.param: The path to the submenu, if adding a separator to a submenu. When adding a separator to the top level of a menu, use an empty string as the path.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.DropDown(UnityEngine.Rect)

summary.para: Show the menu at the given screen rect.

member.param: The position at which to show the menu.

summary.para: Get number of items in the menu.

returns.para: The number of items in the menu.

summary.para: Callback function, called when a menu item is selected.

member.name: T:UnityEditor.GenericMenu.MenuFunction2

summary.para: Callback function with user data, called when a menu item is selected.

member.param: The data to pass through to the callback function.

summary.para: Show the menu under the mouse when right-clicked.
Determines how a gizmo is drawn or picked in the Unity editor.
Draw the gizmo if it is active (shown in the inspector).
Draw the gizmo if it is selected or it is a child/descendent of the selected.
Draw the gizmo if it is not selected.
Draw the gizmo if it is not selected and also no parent/ancestor is selected.
The gizmo can be picked in the editor.
Draw the gizmo if it is selected.
